name: kcow
description: KCOW - Full-stack application with .NET backend and Angular frontend

scripts.start: npm run kill && concurrently -n "frontend,backend" -c "magenta,cyan" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:backend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
